title: Neponematel
author: Neponematel
content: I immediately apologize for my English Hello! From 07.01 all outgoing transactions give an error: "Error Internal Server Error" Screenshot in the post, I'll attach it below if possible. Tried to change servers, turn on VPN. Doesn't bring results. Wanted to make a copy of the wallet, but lost the passphrase. I only have an autificator and a password. The version is up-to-date, downloaded from the official site. Wallet for Androidhttps://ibb.co/jh3T923

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: The problem is with trustedcoin that can't sign 2FA segwit transactions in the new version of electrum. Someone reported the same issue on electrum github, 2 days ago. See issue #8128.You have the following options:1. Wait for trustedcoin to fix the bug.2. Restore your wallet from the seed phrase and disable 2FA. 3. Downgrade electrum to the version 4.3.2

comments.author: nc50lc
comments.body: Try to send now.The issue is now solved by Trusted Coin.Quote from: Neponematel on January 08, 2023, 01:22:26 AMTried to change servers, turn on VPN. Doesn't bring results. Wanted to make a copy of the wallet, but lost the passphrase. I only have an autificator and a password.I looks like you meant "seed phrase" instead of "passphrase"; the 12-words that you should've copied.If so, I'd suggest you to create another wallet and send all of your funds there since using that wallet could lead to loss of funds.Like what happened, if Trusted Coins' server shutdown or became inaccessible; without the seed phrase, your funds will be locked up.
